E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/12/1987
Subject: Progress of Kevin Tapani
Dear Sir,
Kevin Tapani has an ERA of 2.24 at AA San Antonio Dodgers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

How about you?

Subject: Progress of Reggie Jefferson
Dear Sir,
Reggie Jefferson is hitting the ball well at AA San Antonio Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .307, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!

Regards,
Adrian Devine



Date: Monday, 7/28/1987
Subject: Progress of Terry Shumpert
Dear Sir,
Terry Shumpert has nothing more to prove at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .318 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 8/15/1987
Subject: John Wetteland healing process
John Wetteland is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

to promote him soon!
